quote: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion.
author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: Chase your passion, not your pension.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: There is no greatness without a passion to be great.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: Follow your passion, it will lead you to your purpose.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: A great leader’s courage to fulfill his vision comes from passion, not position.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Passion is the genesis of genius.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Do it with passion or not at all.
author: Rosa Nouchette Carey

quote: When you have passion, you don’t need motivation.
author: Unknown

quote: There is no end. There is no beginning. There is only the infinite passion of life.
author: Federico Fellini

quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
author: Ferdinand Foch

quote: Passion is the bridge that takes you from pain to change.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: Great passion can make the impossible possible.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Nothing is as important as passion. No matter what you want to do with your life, be passionate.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: The most successful people are those who are passionate about what they do.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Passion is the difference between having a job or having a career.
author: Unknown

quote: True passion attracts. If you have passion in your life, you can make the impossible happen.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Purpose is the reason you journey. Passion is the fire that lights the way.
author: Unknown

quote: Only passions, great passions, can elevate the soul to great things.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: When you set yourself on fire, people love to come watch you burn.
author: John Wesley

quote: Passion is the oxygen of the soul.
author: Bill Butler

quote: If you don’t love what you do, you won’t do it with much conviction or passion.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
author: Rumi

quote: A true passion that burns within your soul is one that can never be put out.
author: Zoe Sugg

quote: People with great passion can make the impossible happen.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Enthusiasm is excitement with inspiration, motivation, and a pinch of creativity.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: The more you are motivated by love, the more fearless and free your actions will be.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Do what you love and you’ll never work a day in your life.
author: Marc Anthony

quote: Passion is contagious. Get close to people who have it.
author: Unknown
